biotools.summary: Normalization by distributional resampling of high throughput single-cell RNA-sequencing data. Dino is an R package for the normalization of single-cell RNA-seq data using a flexible mixture of negative binomials model of expression.

bioschemas.name: Dino
bioschemas.summary: Normalization by distributional resampling of high throughput single-cell RNA-sequencing data. Dino is an R package for the normalization of single-cell RNA-seq data using a flexible mixture of negative binomials model of expression.
